title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.2 - Minimum price for claim
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.2 - Minimum price for claim

State Regulations

The minimum price for which a horse may be entered in a
claiming race shall be $1,000 but in no case shall it be entered for less than
the value of the purse to the winner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4230.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
